title: Wikipedia - Humanism
description:
"Humanism is a group of philosophies and ethical perspectives which emphasize the value and agency of human beings, individually and collectively, and generally prefers individual thought and evidence (rationalism, empiricism) over established doctrine or faith (fideism)."

Wikipedia Humanism ebook. Selected articles from Wikipedia related to Humanism in .epub format. 

This book is part of the radical seed collection; and for independent researchers
looking to followup the citations and further readings, you can find most of them in the radical seed (https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9389639/Op_Radical_Seed).
